meaningMnemonic: Add a <kanji>bridge</kanji> to a <kanji>jetty</kanji> and you'll have a pretty cool <vocabulary>pier</vocabulary>. Put a ferris wheel on there and make some money!
readingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for 桟 and the kun'yomi reading for 橋. You've learned them both so as long as you remember the rendaku, you should be able to read this word too!
